name: Asteroids Remake (OverLordJem)
description:
This is a remake of the classic game Asteroids. You are a space ship trying to destroy an asteroid belt with just one gun. Use your lasers to destroy the asteroids and dont get hit 3 times or its game over.

Highscore doesn't save yet but you can see the current game's highscore.

This is my first game and any feedback would be appreciated.
